en: Only twenty people will come to the party at best.
zh: 最多只有二十个人会来参加聚会。

en: After a hearty dinner, Willie thanked the host.
zh: 饱餐一顿后，威利感谢了主人。

en: She's a wonderful wife and mother.
zh: 她是一位出色的妻子和母亲。

en: Ms. Swan is our English teacher.
zh: 斯旺女士是我们的英语老师。

en: The Swallows are behind 2 to 1!
zh: 燕子队以1比2落后！

en: The Swallows are ahead 4 to 1!
zh: 燕子队以4比1领先！

en: When is the next train to Sloane Square?
zh: 下一趟去斯隆广场的火车是什么时候？

en: The grass was left long and weedy in the slate walk, and very often he wasn't cutting the grass on the other side of the hedge by the road at all.
zh: 石板路上的草长得很长，杂草丛生，而且他经常根本不修剪路边树篱另一边的草。

en: It's fun to play, too.
zh: 玩起来也很有趣。

en: Then the monkey went round with a little tin cup.
zh: 然后猴子拿着一个小锡杯转来转去。

en: Then you will be happy.
zh: 那样你就会快乐。

en: The dean sighed and said: "I think that this woman is perhaps... my own cousin".
zh: 院长叹了口气说：“我想这位女士可能……是我自己的表妹”。

en: Along comes the grandmother and sees her granddaughter.
zh: 这时祖母来了，看见了她的孙女。

en: Dear woman, why do you involve me? Jesus replied.
zh: 耶稣回答说：“亲爱的女人，你为什么要牵连我呢？”

en: Then you will have money and you will be happy.
zh: 那样你就会有钱，你也会快乐。

en: There is nothing to do, so I may as well go to bed.
zh: 无事可做，我不如去睡觉。

en: Better wear out shoes than sheets.
zh: 与其躺在床上磨损床单，不如出门走走磨损鞋子。

en: They do it just for the thrill of it.
zh: 他们这样做只是为了寻求刺激。

en: The thrilling video game took all my attention.
zh: 这款惊险刺激的电子游戏吸引了我的全部注意力。

en: A man called Slim was killed in the accident.
zh: 一个名叫斯利姆的男子在事故中丧生。

en: The pickpocket disappeared into the crowd.
zh: 扒手消失在人群中。

en: One of the pickpockets blew the whistle on the other two.
zh: 其中一个扒手告发了另外两个。

en: Be on your guard against pickpockets.
zh: 小心扒手。

en: Beware of pickpockets.
zh: 提防扒手。

en: I'd like to report a theft.
zh: 我想报案说我被偷了东西。

en: Please put on your slippers.
zh: 请穿上你的拖鞋。

en: You're not supposed to wear your slippers down to the lobby.
zh: 你不应该穿着拖鞋下到大厅。

en: Measurements are different from individual to individual.
zh: 每个人的测量结果都不一样。

en: Memorize this paragraph until you can say it fluently.
zh: 记住这段话，直到你能流利地说出来。

en: Smog causes plants to die.
zh: 雾霾导致植物死亡。

en: Smog is the enemy of healthy lungs.
zh: 雾霾是健康肺部的敌人。

en: Smog hung over Tokyo.
zh: 雾霾笼罩着东京。

en: Excuse me, but where is the men's shoe department?
zh: 请问，男鞋部在哪里？

en: May I trouble you for a light?
zh: 请问可以借个火吗？

en: I'm sorry, I dropped my knife.
zh: 对不起，我的刀掉了。

en: Excuse me, but would you please tell me the way to the post office?
zh: 请问，请您告诉我邮局怎么走好吗？

en: Please give her a fluoride treatment.
zh: 请给她做氟化物治疗。

en: Please answer the phone.
zh: 请接电话。

en: I'm afraid you can't.
zh: 恐怕你不能。

en: Will you please put the baby to bed?
zh: 请你哄宝宝睡觉好吗？

en: May I trouble you to pass me the pepper?
zh: 请你把胡椒递给我好吗？

en: I'm sorry, but I don't have any small change.
zh: 对不起，我没有零钱。

en: I'm sorry, but they're out of stock.
zh: 对不起，他们没货了。

en: I'm sorry, but I don't understand English well.
zh: 对不起，我不太懂英语。

en: May I trouble you for the sugar?
zh: 请你把糖递给我好吗？

en: Excuse me, but could you tell me the way to the station?
zh: 请问，您能告诉我车站怎么走吗？

en: Would you mind turning down the radio?
zh: 请你把收音机音量调小一点好吗？

en: Would you kindly switch off the radio?
zh: 请你关掉收音机好吗？

en: Would you kindly make room for this old woman?
zh: 请你给这位老妇人让个座好吗？

en: May I trouble you for the pepper?
zh: 请你把胡椒递给我好吗？

en: Excuse me, but may I put my books here?
zh: 请问，我可以把书放在这儿吗？

en: Sorry, we can't fill this prescription here.
zh: 抱歉，我们这里没法配这个药。

en: Excuse me, but could you tell me where the post office is?
zh: 请问，您能告诉我邮局在哪里吗？

en: Excuse me, but might I use the phone?
zh: 请问，我可以借用一下电话吗？

en: Excuse me, but where is the library?
zh: 请问，图书馆在哪里？

en: Will you open the window, please?
zh: 请你把窗户打开，好吗？

en: Excuse me, but can you help me?
zh: 请问，你能帮我一下吗？

en: Sorry, but I want to tell her this news face to face.
zh: 抱歉，但我还是想当面告诉她这个消息。

en: Sorry, but I want to tell him this news face to face.
zh: 抱歉，但我还是想当面告诉他这个消息。

en: Excuse me, do you have the time?
zh: 请问，现在几点了？

en: I'm sorry, but I don't feel like going out today.
zh: 对不起，我今天不太想出门。

en: Sorry, but I have to hurry. I have no time to explain this in detail.
zh: 抱歉，我得赶时间。我没时间详细解释这个。

en: Excuse me, but could you show me the way to the station?
zh: 请问，您能告诉我怎么去车站吗？

en: Excuse me, but will you show me the way to the station?
zh: 请问，您能告诉我怎么去车站吗？

en: Would you please give me some more tea?
zh: 请再给我来点茶，好吗？

en: Excuse me. Can you direct me to the nearest subway station?
zh: 请问，您能告诉我最近的地铁站在哪里吗？

en: Will you please let me go now?
zh: 请你现在放我走，好吗？

en: I'm sorry, could you repeat that please?
zh: 对不起，您能再说一遍吗？

en: Excuse me, but will you tell me the way to the Hilton Hotel?
zh: 请问，您能告诉我怎么去希尔顿酒店吗？

en: Excuse me, but could you tell me the way to the bus stop?
zh: 请问，您能告诉我怎么去公交车站吗？

en: Excuse me, but will you tell me where to change trains?
zh: 请问，您能告诉我应该在哪里换乘火车吗？

en: Sorry, but I'm not very interested in that subject.
zh: 抱歉，我对那个话题不太感兴趣。

en: Do me a favor by switching off that radio.
zh: 帮我个忙，把收音机关掉。

en: Excuse me, but could you tell me how to get to Central Park?
zh: 请问，您能告诉我怎么去中央公园吗？

en: Excuse me, but may I exchange this sweater for another?
zh: 请问，我可以把这件毛衣换一件吗？

en: Would you please lend me some money?
zh: 请你借我一些钱好吗？

en: Excuse me, but could you do me a favor?
zh: 打扰一下，能帮我个忙吗？

en: I beg your pardon, but would you repeat what you said?
zh: 请再说一遍，你刚才说什么？

en: Sorry, I couldn't catch what you said.
zh: 对不起，我没听清楚你说什么。

en: I'm sorry, but I think you're mistaken.
zh: 对不起，我觉得你搞错了。

en: Excuse me, could you spare me a few minutes? I have a favor to ask you.
zh: 打扰一下，能占用你几分钟时间吗？我想请你帮个忙。

en: Sorry, but it all came about so suddenly that I haven't got a handle on the situation yet.
zh: 对不起，事情发生得太突然了，我还没搞清楚状况。

en: I'm sorry, but that's all we have right now.
zh: 对不起，我们现在只有这些了。

en: Sorry? Pardon?
zh: 你说什么？请再说一遍？

en: Excuse me. How often do shuttle buses run to downtown New York?
zh: 请问，去纽约市中心的班车多久一班？

en: Sorry, the line is busy now.
zh: 对不起，现在线路很忙。

en: Excuse me, I think you're sitting in my seat.
zh: 打扰一下，我觉得你坐在我的座位上了。

en: Excuse me, does this train go to Washington Square?
zh: 请问，这趟火车到华盛顿广场吗？

en: I'm sorry, I'm busy right now.
zh: 对不起，我现在很忙。

en: I'm sorry I did you wrong.
zh: 对不起，我做错了。

en: Sorry sir, I'm afraid he may not be in.
zh: 先生，对不起，恐怕他不在。

en: I'm sorry, I dialed the wrong number.
zh: 对不起，我打错电话了。

en: Excuse me, I'm lost.
zh: 打扰一下，我迷路了。

en: Excuse me. May I get by?
zh: 借光，让我过去一下。

en: I'm sorry. I have another appointment.
zh: 对不起，我还有别的约会。

en: I'm sorry. Would you mind turning around?
zh: 对不起，你介意转过身去吗？

en: Excuse me. I'd like to rent a car.
zh: 打扰一下，我想租一辆车。

en: Excuse me, I have to get off at the next stop.
zh: 打扰一下，我必须在下一站下车。

en: Excuse me, but I feel sick.
zh: 对不起，我觉得不舒服。

en: I'm sorry, you are not allowed to.
zh: 对不起，你不能这样做。

en: Sorry, I've got my hands full now.
zh: 不好意思，我现在忙得不可开交。

en: I'm sorry, but I didn't catch what you said.
zh: 对不起，我没听清您说什么。

en: Excuse me, would you mind repeating that?
zh: 请问，您能重复一遍吗？

en: Excuse me, could you say that again more slowly?
zh: 请问，您能再说一遍，慢一点吗？

en: Sorry. I beg your pardon?
zh: 对不起，您说什么？

en: Excuse me, but we're in a hurry, too.
zh: 不好意思，我们也赶时间。

en: Excuse me. May I get through?
zh: 请让一下，我能过去吗？

en: Sorry, I wish you wouldn't.
zh: 对不起，我希望你不要这样。

en: Excuse me, is this seat taken?
zh: 请问，这儿有人吗？

en: I'm sorry, we can't make flight changes on this ticket.
zh: 对不起，这张票不能改签。

en: Excuse me, but I think this is my seat.
zh: 不好意思，我想这是我的座位。

en: Sorry, I can't accommodate you.
zh: 对不起，我无法满足您的要求。

en: Excuse me, officer, where are we now?
zh: 警官，请问我们现在在哪儿？

en: Someone is hiding in the corner.
zh: 有人躲在角落里。

en: Who is the man sitting in the corner?
zh: 坐在角落里的那个人是谁？

en: Mrs. Smith is bearing up well since the death of her husband.
zh: 自从她丈夫去世后，史密斯太太一直很坚强。

en: Mrs. Smith is an elderly lady.
zh: 史密斯太太是一位老妇人。

en: Mrs. Smith was a famous beauty.
zh: 史密斯太太曾经是一位著名的美人。

en: Mrs. Smith goes to church by car.
zh: 史密斯太太坐车去教堂。

en: Mrs. Smith is in black.
zh: 史密斯太太穿着黑色的衣服。

en: Mrs. Smith is our English teacher.
zh: 史密斯太太是我们的英语老师。

en: Mrs. Smith is actively engaged in volunteer work.
zh: 史密斯太太积极参与志愿者工作。

en: Mrs. Smith can get her husband to do anything she likes.
zh: 史密斯太太能让她丈夫做任何她想做的事情。

en: You could say that Mrs. Smith is a television addict.
zh: 你可以说史密斯太太是个电视迷。

en: Mrs. Smith gave birth to her second child.
zh: 史密斯太太生了她的第二个孩子。

en: Mr. and Mrs. Smith are a good match.
zh: 史密斯夫妇很般配。

en: Mr. and Mrs. Smith live apart from each other now.
zh: 史密斯夫妇现在分居了。

en: The Smiths had their house painted white.
zh: 史密斯一家把他们的房子漆成了白色。

en: Mr. and Mrs. Smith are the sort of couple who don't go out much in the evenings.
zh: 史密斯夫妇就是那种晚上不怎么出门的夫妻。

en: He's just about had enough of the Smiths' TV.
zh: 他简直受够了史密斯家的电视声。

en: Dr. Smith is the most knowledgeable expert in that subject.
zh: 史密斯博士是那个领域里知识最渊博的专家。

en: Mr Smith drilled them in English pronunciation.
zh: 史密斯先生严格训练他们的英语发音。

en: Miss Smith is liked by all students.
zh: 史密斯小姐深受所有学生的喜爱。

en: Mr Smith teaches me English.
zh: 史密斯先生教我英语。

en: Mr Smith left Japan this morning.
zh: 史密斯先生今天早上离开了日本。

en: Is Miss Smith an English teacher?
zh: 史密斯小姐是英语老师吗？

en: Mr Smith is in charge of the class.
zh: 史密斯先生负责这个班级。

en: Miss Smith teaches English at this school.
zh: 史密斯小姐在这所学校教英语。

en: Mr Smith always begins his lectures with a joke.
zh: 史密斯先生总是以一个笑话开始他的讲座。

en: Dr. Smith has a lot of patients.
zh: 史密斯医生有很多病人。

en: Who will be in charge of our class when Miss Smith leaves school?
zh: 史密斯小姐离开学校后，谁将负责我们的班级？

en: Mr Smith and I have been acquainted with each other for a long time.
zh: 史密斯先生和我认识很久了。

en: Mr Smith is a good teacher.
zh: 史密斯先生是一位好老师。

en: Mr Smith hasn't turned up yet though he promised to.
zh: 史密斯先生虽然答应了，但还没出现。

en: Mr Smith married his daughter to a doctor.
zh: 史密斯先生把他的女儿嫁给了一位医生。

en: Mr Smith gave a lecture on literature.
zh: 史密斯先生做了一场关于文学的讲座。

en: Mr Smith made her his secretary.
zh: 史密斯先生让她当了他的秘书。

en: Mr Smith forgot to take his commuter ticket.
zh: 史密斯先生忘记带他的通勤票了。

en: Mr Smith takes a good deal of exercise before breakfast.
zh: 史密斯先生早餐前做了大量的运动。

en: Mr Smith is an eminent violinist.
zh: 史密斯先生是一位著名的提琴家。

en: Mr Smith sued them for damages.
zh: 史密斯先生起诉他们要求赔偿。

en: Mr Smith is a doctor by profession.
zh: 史密斯先生的职业是医生。

en: Mr Smith had his letter typed.
zh: 史密斯先生让人把他的信打字了。

en: Mr Smith is a candidate for mayor.
zh: 史密斯先生是市长的候选人。

en: Mr Smith is pleased at his son's success.
zh: 史密斯先生对儿子的成功感到高兴。

en: Mr Smith is accused of breach of contract.
zh: 史密斯先生被指控违反合同。

en: Mr Smith proposed marriage to Jane.
zh: 史密斯先生向简求婚。

en: Mr Smith is vulnerable to this kind of criticism.
zh: 史密斯先生容易受到这种批评。

en: The study which Mr Smith specializes in is economics.
zh: 史密斯先生专攻的研究是经济学。

en: Mr Smith had three sons who became engineers.
zh: 史密斯先生有三个儿子，他们都成了工程师。

en: I have a bowing acquaintance with Mr Smith.
zh: 我和史密斯先生只是点头之交。

en: I have a nodding acquaintance with Mr Smith.
zh: 我和史密斯先生只是点头之交。

en: Mr Smith was announced as the succeeding chairman.
zh: 史密斯先生被宣布为下一任主席。

en: Mr Smith founded this school forty years ago.
zh: 史密斯先生四十年前创办了这所学校。

en: Mr Smith is now president of this company.
zh: 史密斯先生现在是这家公司的总裁。

en: Professor Smith is recognized to be one of the greatest scholars in English philology.
zh: 史密斯教授被认为是英国语文学中最伟大的学者之一。

en: Prof. Smith is famous for his eccentric life style.
zh: 史密斯教授以其古怪的生活方式而闻名。

en: Talking of Professor Smith, his assistant is hard of hearing.
zh: 说到史密斯教授，他的助手听力不好。

en: The Smiths are all good people.
zh: 史密斯一家都是好人。

en: The Smiths moved to Ohio.
zh: 史密斯一家搬到了俄亥俄州。

en: Mr. Smith is sure to come on Sunday.
zh: 史密斯先生肯定会在星期天来。

en: Mr. Smith should have told the truth.
zh: 史密斯先生本应该说实话。

en: Smith died of a heart attack.
zh: 史密斯死于心脏病。

en: Smith demanded payment.
zh: 史密斯要求付款。

en: Smith struck Jones out.
zh: 史密斯三振了琼斯。

en: Smith argues that no international laws can be applied to this case.
zh: 史密斯认为，没有任何国际法可以适用于这个案件。

en: Mr Smith has lived in Kyoto for three years.
zh: 史密斯先生已经在京都住了三年。

en: Smith's approach differs greatly from others in that he did not take the affixation into consideration.
zh: 史密斯的方法与其他人的方法大相径庭，因为他没有考虑到词缀。

en: The Smiths are our cousins.
zh: 史密斯一家是我们的表亲。

en: The Smiths are our neighbors.
zh: 史密斯一家是我们的邻居。

en: Few people can run the machine as well as Mr Smith.
zh: 很少有人能像史密斯先生一样熟练地操作这台机器。

en: Mr Smith is too polite to say anything bad about others.
zh: 史密斯先生太有礼貌了，不会说别人的坏话。

en: Mr Smith hasn't turned up yet though he promised to come.
zh: 史密斯先生答应要来，但到现在还没出现。

en: Mr Smith made him a doctor.
zh: 史密斯先生让他成了一名医生。

en: Mr Smith made it a rule to take a walk every morning.
zh: 史密斯先生规定每天早上散步。

en: Mr Smith made him some toys.
zh: 史密斯先生给他做了一些玩具。

en: Mr Smith has not turned up yet though he promised to come.
zh: 史密斯先生答应要来，但到现在还没出现。

en: Mr Smith lost his way in the dense fog.
zh: 史密斯先生在浓雾中迷路了。

en: Mr Smith says, "I was born in New York."
zh: 史密斯先生说：“我出生在纽约。”

en: Mr Smith says, "I was born in New York, but my wife comes San Francisco."
zh: 史密斯先生说：“我出生在纽约，但我妻子来自旧金山。”

en: Mr Smith thinks that he's a big shot.
zh: 史密斯先生认为他自己是个大人物。

en: Mr Smith is now on duty.
zh: 史密斯先生现在正在值班。

en: Mr Smith lives in Kyoto now.
zh: 史密斯先生现在住在京都。

en: Mr Smith was bereaved of his wife.
zh: 史密斯先生失去了他的妻子。

en: Mr. Smith doesn't speak English, does he?
zh: 史密斯先生不说英语，是吗？

en: Even though Mr Smith was very wealthy, he was a tight wad.
zh: 即使史密斯先生非常富有，他也是个守财奴。

en: Mr Smith carried out the plan successfully.
zh: 史密斯先生成功地执行了这项计划。

en: Mr Smith is within shouting distance.
zh: 史密斯先生就在喊叫能听到的距离内。

en: Mr Smith is drinking coffee.
zh: 史密斯先生正在喝咖啡。

en: Mr Smith lived in Kyoto three years ago.
zh: 史密斯先生三年前住在京都。

en: Mr Smith says he was born in New York, but that his wife comes from Japan.
zh: 史密斯先生说他出生在纽约，但他妻子来自日本。

en: Mr Smith, whose car I borrowed for this trip, is a rich lawyer.
zh: 史密斯先生，我这次旅行借了他的车，是一位富有的律师。

en: The Smiths live in my neighborhood.
zh: 史密斯一家住在我的邻居。

en: A farewell party was held in honor of Mr Smith.
zh: 为了纪念史密斯先生，举行了一个告别派对。

en: Please connect me with Mr Smith.
zh: 请帮我接通史密斯先生。

en: I tried to call Mr Smith, but the line was busy.
zh: 我试着给史密斯先生打电话，但线路很忙。

en: I would like to see Mr Smith.
zh: 我想见史密斯先生。

en: Will you please connect me with Mr Smith?
zh: 请你帮我接通史密斯先生好吗？

en: Mr Smith is an acquaintance of hers.
zh: 史密斯先生是她的一个熟人。

en: I've known Mr Smith for many years.
zh: 我认识史密斯先生很多年了。

en: A Mr Smith has come to see you.
zh: 一位史密斯先生来找你。

en: How long have you known Miss Smith?
zh: 你认识史密斯小姐多久了？

en: A Mr Smith came to see you during your absence.
zh: 你不在的时候，一位史密斯先生来找过你。

en: Talking of Smith, what has become of his daughter?
zh: 说到史密斯，他女儿怎么样了？

en: A Mr Smith came to see you.
zh: 一位史密斯先生来找你。

en: Mr Smith spoke so fast I couldn't take in what he said.
zh: 史密斯先生说话太快了，我听不清楚他在说什么。

en: Mrs. Smith, I'd like to introduce a friend of mine, Pierre Dubois.
zh: 史密斯夫人，我想介绍我的一个朋友，皮埃尔·杜波依斯。

en: He said that if Smith was elected, he would resign.
zh: 他说如果史密斯当选，他就会辞职。

en: Would you mind if I borrowed your car?
zh: 你介意我借用你的车吗？

en: Excuse me, but I'm tied up now.
zh: 对不起，我现在走不开。

en: What am I going to do? I can't close my fly.
zh: 我该怎么办？我的裤子拉链拉不上了。

en: A sponge absorbs water.
zh: 海绵吸水。

en: A sponge absorbs liquids.
zh: 海绵吸收液体。

en: Your pants reach the floor.
zh: 你的裤子拖到地上了。

en: Did Spot go, too?
zh: 斯波特也去了吗？

en: I have no leisure for sport.
zh: 我没有空闲时间做运动。

en: I like sport.
zh: 我喜欢运动。

en: Sports activities require a slender figure.
zh: 体育活动需要苗条的身材。

en: Poor eyesight is a handicap to a sportsman.
zh: 视力不好是运动员的障碍。

en: Sport is frankly mimic warfare.
zh: 运动坦率地说就是模仿战争。

en: Sports nurture friendships.
zh: 运动能培养友谊。

en: Apart from sports, I like listening to jazz music.
zh: 除了运动，我喜欢听爵士乐。

en: Sports play an important role in social life.
zh: 运动在社会生活中扮演着重要的角色。

en: I do not do sports.
zh: 我不做运动。

en: Do you like playing sports?
zh: 你喜欢做运动吗？

en: Sports help to develop our muscles.
zh: 运动有助于我们锻炼肌肉。

en: Sports can be dangerous if safety is ignored.
zh: 如果忽视安全，运动可能会很危险。

en: You have to give up sports for a while.
zh: 你必须放弃运动一段时间。

en: Sports keep us in good shape.
zh: 运动使我们保持良好的体形。

en: Sports make us healthy in mind as well as in body.
zh: 运动使我们身心健康。

en: The better players helped those who were not so good at sports.
zh: 优秀的运动员会帮助那些不擅长运动的人。

en: The paradox of sport is that it bonds as it divides.
zh: 运动的悖论在于它既能团结又能分裂。

en: Do you have any interest in sports?
zh: 你对运动有兴趣吗？

en: Some students neglect their studies in favor of sports.
zh: 一些学生为了运动而忽略了学习。

en: I maintain that sports are a waste of time.
zh: 我认为运动是浪费时间。

en: Speaking of sports, can you play tennis?
zh: 说到运动，你会打网球吗？

en: Australians excel at sports and entertainment.
zh: 澳大利亚人在体育和娱乐方面都很出色。

en: Talking of sports, what sports do you play?
zh: 说到运动，你玩什么运动？

en: When it comes to sports, I can't beat her.
zh: 说到运动，我比不过她。

en: When it comes to sports, John is very good.
zh: 说到运动，约翰很擅长。

en: In sport, team harmony is vital to success.
zh: 在体育运动中，团队和谐对成功至关重要。

en: I love music as well as sports.
zh: 我喜欢音乐，也喜欢运动。

en: It's not only the health aspects of sports that appeal to people, but the cooperative aspect that team sports teach, and the competitive aspect in itself.
zh: 吸引人们的不仅是体育运动的健康方面，还有团队运动所教导的合作精神，以及竞争本身。

en: Some people like sports, and others don't.
zh: 有些人喜欢运动，有些人不喜欢。

en: I love sports. I get that from my father.
zh: 我喜欢运动。这是遗传自我父亲的。

en: The spokesman confirmed that the report was true.
zh: 发言人证实该报告属实。

en: Could you spell it, please?
zh: 请您拼写一下好吗？

en: Everything is on schedule.
zh: 一切都在按计划进行。

en: Everything happened all at once.
zh: 所有事情一下子都发生了。

en: You must be doing wonderfully in everything.
zh: 你一定在所有方面都做得非常出色。

en: All systems are go.
zh: 一切准备就绪。

en: We must surrender them all.
zh: 我们必须交出他们所有人。

en: Everything was as it had been when I left there.
zh: 一切都和我离开那里时一样。

en: Everything went according to plan.
zh: 一切都按计划进行。

en: I owe it all to you.
zh: 这一切都归功于你。

en: Everything fell out as I expected.
zh: 一切都如我所料。

en: Let's scrap everything and start over again with a clean slate.
zh: 让我们放弃一切，重新开始。

en: Bring everything to ruin.
zh: 使一切毁灭。

en: Taking everything into consideration, he can't be the criminal.
zh: 考虑到所有因素，他不可能是罪犯。

en: All things considered, she is a fairly good wife.
zh: 总的来说，她是一个相当好的妻子。

en: All things considered, we can not say that it is wrong.
zh: 总的来说，我们不能说它是错的。

en: All things considered, we cannot say that it is wrong.
zh: 总的来说，我们不能说它是错的。

en: Taking everything into consideration, they ought to be given another chance.
zh: 考虑到所有因素，应该再给他们一次机会。

en: All things considered, we'll adopt his project.
zh: 总的来说，我们将采纳他的项目。

en: All tragedies end with a death.
zh: 所有的悲剧都以死亡告终。

en: Everything depends on her answer.
zh: 一切都取决于她的回答。

en: All the signs are that she is getting better.
zh: 所有的迹象都表明她正在好转。

en: All containing news of his concerts and various activities.
zh: 所有内容都包含他的音乐会和各种活动的消息。

en: Everything was burnt to ashes.
zh: 一切都被烧成灰烬。

en: Everything turned out satisfactory.
zh: 一切结果令人满意。

en: Everything is over.
zh: 一切都结束了。

en: All comes to the same thing.
zh: 所有结果都一样。

en: Everything depends upon your decision.
zh: 一切都取决于你的决定。

en: Everything depends on whether you pass the examination.
zh: 一切都取决于你是否能通过考试。

en: Everything depends on what you will do.
zh: 一切都取决于你将要做什么。

en: It all depends on whether they will support us.
zh: 这完全取决于他们是否会支持我们。

en: Of all the famous baseball players, he stands out as a genius.
zh: 在所有著名的棒球运动员中，他以天才著称。

en: The wild beasts all gather.
zh: 所有的野兽都聚集在一起。

en: Suddenly all the lights went out.
zh: 突然，所有的灯都熄灭了。

en: Not all books are good books.
zh: 并非所有的书都是好书。

en: Not all the books are worth reading.
zh: 并非所有的书都值得阅读。

en: All the clergy are against the new law.
zh: 所有的神职人员都反对这项新法律。

en: Every mother has affection for her child.
zh: 每位母亲都爱自己的孩子。

en: Some common threads run through all cultures.
zh: 一些共同的主线贯穿于所有文化。

en: All civilized countries are against war.
zh: 所有文明国家都反对战争。

en: Lay down all arms.
zh: 放下所有武器。

en: It all started in Montgomery, Alabama, on December 1, 1955.
zh: 一切都始于1955年12月1日在阿拉巴马州蒙哥马利。

en: All horses are animals, but not all animals are horses.
zh: 所有的马都是动物，但并非所有的动物都是马。

en: Not all animals are wild.
zh: 并非所有的动物都是野生的。

en: All the lights went out.
zh: 所有的灯都熄灭了。

en: You must give up the idea that you are superior to them in every respect.
zh: 你必须放弃你在各方面都优于他们的想法。

en: I agreed with you in all your views.
zh: 我同意你的所有观点。

en: I found all the shops closed by that time.
zh: 我发现那时所有的商店都关门了。

en: Not all birds can fly.
zh: 不是所有的鸟都会飞。

en: Not every bird can sing.
zh: 不是每只鸟都会唱歌。

en: Every boy is supposed to wear a tie at the party.
zh: 每个男孩都应该在聚会上系领带。

en: All the villages were beautiful.
zh: 所有的村庄都很美丽。

en: All our teachers were young and loved teaching.
zh: 我们所有的老师都很年轻，并且热爱教学。

en: Every teacher knows that Ann is a good athlete.
zh: 每位老师都知道安是一位优秀的运动员。

en: All students looked up to their homeroom teacher.
zh: 所有的学生都尊敬他们的班主任。

en: Every star is a sphere.
zh: 每颗星星都是一个球体。

en: You should regard the rights of all.
zh: 你应该尊重所有人的权利。

en: All human beings are legally equal.
zh: 所有人在法律上都是平等的。

en: It is believed that all men are equal.
zh: 人们相信人人生而平等。

en: All human beings are mortal.
zh: 所有的人都会死。

en: Not all men are created equal.
zh: 并非所有人生来平等。

en: You must not trust every man.
zh: 你不能相信每个人。

en: The true light that gives light to every man was coming into the world.
zh: 那光是真光，照亮一切生在世上的人。

en: It is by no means easy to please everybody.
zh: 要让每个人都满意绝非易事。

en: You can fool all the people some of the time, and some of the people all the time; but you cannot fool all the people all of the time.
zh: 你可以在某些时候欺骗所有人，也可以在所有时候欺骗某些人；但你不能在所有时候欺骗所有人。

en: Everybody must be subject to law.
zh: 每个人都必须服从法律。

en: Everybody is bound to obey the laws.
zh: 每个人都有义务遵守法律。

en: Everybody is equal before the law.
zh: 在法律面前人人平等。

en: Everybody is subject to law.
zh: 每个人都必须服从法律。

en: Everyone should exercise their right to vote.
zh: 每个人都应该行使他们的投票权。

en: Everybody has his merits and demerits.
zh: 每个人都有他的优点和缺点。

en: All men have equal rights.
zh: 人人生而平等。

en: All men are created equal.
zh: 人人生而平等。

en: All people breathe air.
zh: 所有人都要呼吸空气。

en: All men are equal before God.
zh: 在上帝面前，人人平等。

en: A friend to everybody is a friend to leisure.
zh: 对每个人都是朋友的人，实际上是没有朋友。

en: You should set a high value on every man's life.
zh: 你应该高度重视每个人的生命。

en: It goes without saying that everybody is given the equal right to speak.
zh: 不用说，每个人都有平等的发言权。

en: So that through him all man might believe.
zh: 以便所有的人都因他而相信。

en: That everybody is told all the facts is important.
zh: 重要的是，每个人都被告知所有的事实。

en: Not everybody knows about my plan.
zh: 不是每个人都知道我的计划。

en: Not everyone can realize the dreams of his youth.
zh: 不是每个人都能实现年轻时的梦想。

en: We have enough seats for everyone.
zh: 我们有足够的座位给每个人。

en: Nobody ever wants to be without money.
zh: 没有人想缺钱。

en: Every man cannot be a hero.
zh: 不是每个人都能成为英雄。

en: It is not easy to be understood by everybody.
zh: 要被所有人理解并不容易。

en: Not everyone likes that book.
zh: 不是每个人都喜欢那本书。

en: Not everybody knows about the plan.
zh: 不是每个人都知道这个计划。

en: It is necessary that everybody observe these rules.
zh: 每个人都必须遵守这些规则。

en: Not all men are wise.
zh: 并非所有人都聪明。

en: All parents like to have their children praised.
zh: 所有的父母都喜欢他们的孩子被称赞。

en: He maintained that all occupations should be open to women.
zh: 他坚持认为所有职业都应该向女性开放。

en: It is now a fully accepted idea that all occupations should be open to women.
zh: 现在，所有职业都应该向女性开放，这已经是一个完全被接受的观点。

en: All the passengers left the plane in a hurry.
zh: 所有的乘客都匆忙离开了飞机。

en: All the evidence points to his guilt.
zh: 所有的证据都指向他有罪。

en: All the boys ran away.
zh: 所有男孩都跑掉了。

en: All the officers and men joined their efforts against the attack.
zh: 全体官兵同心协力，抵抗进攻。

en: I will see to it that everything is ready in time.
zh: 我会留意的，保证一切及时准备就绪。

en: Every experiment required a protected environment and an entirely objective frame of mind.
zh: 每个实验都需要一个受保护的环境和一个完全客观的头脑。

en: Taking all things into consideration, I think they were mistaken in it.
zh: 考虑到所有因素，我认为他们在这件事上是错误的。

en: Every citizen ought to help them.
zh: 每个公民都应该帮助他们。

en: All children are potential geniuses.
zh: 所有孩子都是潜在的天才。

en: All participants made that great effort in the Olympics.
zh: 所有参赛者都在奥运会上付出了巨大的努力。

en: We must make every effort to do away with all discrimination.
zh: 我们必须尽一切努力消除一切歧视。

en: Every nation should help each other.
zh: 每个国家都应该互相帮助。

en: Every nation longs for world peace.
zh: 每个国家都渴望世界和平。

en: All happy families resemble each other, each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.
zh: 所有幸福的家庭都相似，每个不幸的家庭都有各自的不幸。

en: Every language continues to change as long as it is spoken.
zh: 每种语言只要还在使用，就会不断变化。

en: In the greatest of all works of art everything had been realized, I could give nothing, and my restless mind tired of passive contemplation.
zh: 在最伟大的艺术作品中，一切都已实现，我什么也给不了，我那颗躁动的心厌倦了被动的沉思。

en: All the competitors are trying to get their piece of the pie.
zh: 所有竞争者都试图分得一杯羹。

en: Not all the students were present.
zh: 并非所有学生都到场了。

en: All the students respect their home room teacher.
zh: 所有学生都尊敬他们的班主任。

en: Not every student went there yesterday.
zh: 昨天不是每个学生都去了那里。

en: Not all the students attended the meeting.
zh: 并非所有学生都参加了会议。

en: All the students are studying English.
zh: 所有学生都在学习英语。

en: All members have access to these books.
zh: 所有成员都可以查阅这些书籍。

en: It is necessary that every member observe these rules.
zh: 每个成员都必须遵守这些规则。

en: Four-fifths of all the members were against the plan.
zh: 五分之四的成员反对这项计划。

en: 80% of all English words come from other languages.
zh: 80%的英语单词来自其他语言。

en: Not all doctors make a lot of money.
zh: 并非所有医生都能赚很多钱。

en: All essays must be handed in on time.
zh: 所有文章必须按时上交。

en: All things are obedient to money.
zh: 有钱能使鬼推磨。

en: Everything looked nice.
zh: 一切看起来都很不错。

en: All was still.
zh: 一切都很安静。

en: All the other little rabbits came out to see how happy they both were, and they danced in a wedding circle around the little black rabbit and little white rabbit.
zh: 所有其他的小兔子都出来看他们俩有多高兴，他们围着小黑兔和小百兔跳起了婚礼舞。

en: All the buses are full.
zh: 所有的公共汽车都满了。

en: After I locked all the doors, I went to bed.
zh: 我锁好所有的门后，就去睡觉了。

en: Shut all the doors and windows.
zh: 把所有的门窗都关上。

en: Please leave everything to me.
zh: 请把一切都交给我。

en: All things taken into consideration, her life is a happy one.
zh: 考虑到所有的事情，她的生活是幸福的。

en: Taking everything into consideration, he bought the car.
zh: 考虑到所有的事情，他买了这辆车。

en: All the dogs are alive.
zh: 所有的狗都活着。

en: Not all Americans speak English as their mother tongue.
zh: 并非所有美国人都以英语为母语。

en: I'm satisfied with everything.
zh: 我对一切都很满意。

en: Everything is in good order.
zh: 一切都井然有序。

en: Everything militated against his success.
zh: 一切都不利于他的成功。

en: All this is visible to numerous observers.
zh: 这一切对众多观察者来说都是可见的。

en: Everything is going very well.
zh: 一切进展顺利。

en: Everything appears to be going well.
zh: 一切似乎进展顺利。

en: Everything should be done in accordance with the rules.
zh: 一切都应该按照规则进行。

en: Everything is OK.
zh: 一切都好。

en: What does the special taste like?
zh: 这个特别的味道怎么样？

en: The space shuttle informs us about the earth, too.
zh: 航天飞机也向我们介绍了地球。

en: How about some Spanish food?
zh: 来点西班牙菜怎么样？

en: The explosion of the space shuttle is still fresh in my memory.
zh: 航天飞机爆炸的情景我仍然记忆犹新。

en: Spaniards love to stroll around in the evening cool.
zh: 西班牙人喜欢在凉爽的傍晚散步。

en: It would be to your advantage to study Spanish.
zh: 学习西班牙语对你有利。

en: I know a little Spanish.
zh: 我懂一点西班牙语。

en: It is worthwhile learning Spanish.
zh: 学习西班牙语是值得的。

en: A little knowledge of Spanish will go a long way toward making your trip to Mexico enjoyable.
zh: 懂一点西班牙语对你愉快地游览墨西哥大有帮助。

en: I can understand written Spanish just a little but spoken Spanish is Greek to me.
zh: 我能看懂一点西班牙语，但西班牙语口语对我来说就像希腊语一样难懂。

en: I wish I could have spoken Spanish.
zh: 我希望我能说西班牙语。

en: Spanish is her native language.
zh: 西班牙语是她的母语。

en: Spain once governed the Philippine Islands.
zh: 西班牙曾经统治过菲律宾群岛。

en: Spain was one of the world's mightiest nations.
zh: 西班牙曾经是世界上最强大的国家之一。

en: Spain is abundant in oranges.
zh: 西班牙盛产橙子。

en: Spain is the host country for the Olympics in 1992.
zh: 西班牙是1992年奥运会的主办国。

en: The population of Spain is about one-third as large as that of Japan.
zh: 西班牙的人口大约是日本的三分之一。

en: The rain in Spain falls mainly on the plain.
zh: 西班牙的雨主要下在平原上。

en: If you visit Spain, come and see me.
zh: 如果你去西班牙，来看我。

en: I hiked through the Pyrenees from Spain to Paris.
zh: 我徒步穿越了比利牛斯山脉，从西班牙到巴黎。

en: The sprinkler is shooting out a stream of water onto the grass.
zh: 洒水器正向草坪喷射出一股水流。

en: Could we have a spoon?
zh: 我们可以要一个勺子吗？

en: There is a spoon missing.
zh: 少了一把勺子。

en: The Sphinx began to walk around him.
zh: 斯芬克斯开始在他周围走动。

en: The Sphinx had eaten hundreds of people on their way to the city of Thebes, because they could not answer the riddle the cunning Sphinx had asked them.
zh: 斯芬克斯吃掉了数百名前往底比斯城的人，因为他们无法回答狡猾的斯芬克斯提出的谜语。

en: This is the first time I have seen a Spielberg movie.
zh: 这是我第一次看斯皮尔伯格的电影。

en: I got into trouble with the police by driving too fast.
zh: 我因为超速驾驶惹上了警察。

en: The speedometer was indicating 95 mph.
zh: 速度计显示时速95英里。

en: The speedometer is recording 100 mph now.
zh: 速度计现在显示时速100英里。

en: Driving too fast is dangerous.
zh: 超速驾驶很危险。

en: Speeding often causes car accidents.
zh: 超速行驶经常导致交通事故。

en: You're driving too fast.
zh: 你开得太快了。

en: I can hardly make a speech without feeling nervous.
zh: 我一想到要演讲就紧张得说不出话来。

en: How did your speech go?
zh: 你的演讲怎么样？

en: In the speech, he referred to the strength of the company.

zh: 我不愿意花这么多钱买一套西装。

en: Can you manage to carry the suitcase by yourself?
zh: 你能自己拿着这个手提箱吗？

en: I'll take your suitcase to your room.
zh: 我把你的手提箱拿到你的房间。

en: Let me relieve you of your suitcase.
zh: 我来帮你拿手提箱吧。

en: Tighten the strap around the suitcase.
zh: 把手提箱上的带子系紧。

en: The suitcase contained nothing but dirty clothes.
zh: 手提箱里只有脏衣服。

en: I think my suitcase was stolen.
zh: 我想我的手提箱被偷了。

en: One of my suitcases is missing.
zh: 我的一个手提箱不见了。

en: Don't talk so impudently.
zh: 不要这么无礼地说话。

en: I wish I could play the piano as well as Susie.
zh: 我希望我能像苏西一样弹钢琴。

en: Susie is so constituted that she cannot forgive and forget things.
zh: 苏西的性格就是这样，她无法原谅和忘记事情。

en: Susie could not settle her fears.
zh: 苏西无法平息她的恐惧。

en: Susie loves Japanese music.
zh: 苏西喜欢日本音乐。

en: Susie doesn't speak Japanese, and Tom doesn't either.
zh: 苏西不会说日语，汤姆也不会。

en: Susie sat up until midnight, when she heard a strange noise.
zh: 苏西熬夜到午夜，那时她听到一个奇怪的声音。

en: Susie sometimes visits her father's office.
zh: 苏西有时会拜访她父亲的办公室。

en: Susie can type many times as fast as I can.
zh: 苏西打字的速度比我快很多倍。

en: Susie lent me two books, neither of which I have read as yet.
zh: 苏西借给我两本书，但我一本都还没读。

en: Susie was unable to take part in the game because she wasn't feeling well.
zh: 苏西因为身体不舒服，所以无法参加比赛。

en: Susie has a nice smile.
zh: 苏西的笑容很甜美。

en: Suzy hopes that Tom will ask her out.
zh: 苏西希望汤姆会约她出去。

en: Susie's hair is very long.
zh: 苏西的头发很长。

en: Susie's mother is a most beautiful woman.
zh: 苏西的母亲是一位非常美丽的女性。

en: Susie wasn't very feminine.
zh: 苏西不太有女人味。

en: Susan is a good cook.
zh: 苏珊很会做饭。

en: Susan may not come, but Betty certainly will.
zh: 苏珊可能不会来，但贝蒂肯定会来。

en: Susan has promised her mother that she will call her to let her know that they have arrived safely.
zh: 苏珊向她母亲保证，她会打电话告诉她，他们已经安全抵达。

en: Susan enjoys listening to music.
zh: 苏珊喜欢听音乐。

en: Susan really takes after her mother.
zh: 苏珊真的很像她的母亲。

en: Susan shined her father's shoes.
zh: 苏珊擦亮了她父亲的鞋子。

en: Susan broke the dish on purpose to show her anger.
zh: 苏珊故意打破盘子来表达她的愤怒。

en: Susan is indifferent to politics.
zh: 苏珊对政治漠不关心。

en: Susan is intelligent, and I expect her to pass the exam easily.
zh: 苏珊很聪明，我希望她能轻松通过考试。

en: Susan spent the summer vacation at her grandmother's.
zh: 苏珊在奶奶家度过了暑假。

en: Susan eats like a bird and leaves most of the food on her plate.
zh: 苏珊吃得很少，像小鸟一样，盘子里剩下很多食物。

en: Susan manages to tell her mother that it is time to say goodbye.
zh: 苏珊设法告诉她的母亲，是时候说再见了。

en: Susan is two years my senior.
zh: 苏珊比我大两岁。

en: Susan is actually your half sister.
zh: 苏珊实际上是你的同父异母/同母异父的妹妹。

en: Susan found out where the puppy had come from.
zh: 苏珊查出了小狗是从哪里来的。

en: Susan was not playing the piano then.
zh: 那时苏珊没有在弹钢琴。

en: Susan made a dress for Jill.
zh: 苏珊为吉尔做了一件连衣裙。

en: Susan was terrified.
zh: 苏珊吓坏了。

en: Susan greeted her guests at the door.
zh: 苏珊在门口迎接她的客人。

en: Susan is majoring in American history.
zh: 苏珊主修美国历史。

en: It was very dark in Susan's room.
zh: 苏珊的房间里很黑。

en: Susan left an hour ago.
zh: 苏珊一小时前离开了。

en: Susan and Bob have flown from London to Sydney, Australia.
zh: 苏珊和鲍勃已经从伦敦飞往澳大利亚悉尼。

en: I'm Susan Greene.
zh: 我是苏珊·格林。

en: Susan burst into tears.
zh: 苏珊突然哭了起来。

en: I'm amazed Sue accepted his proposal.
zh: 我很惊讶苏接受了他的求婚。

en: The population of Sweden is on the increase.
zh: 瑞典的人口正在增长。

en: Sweden has a language of its own.
zh: 瑞典有自己的语言。

en: Dr. Sweet's nature belied his name.
zh: 斯威特博士的性格与他的名字不符（名不副实）。

en: Excuse me, but may I use your telephone?
zh: 打扰一下，我可以借用一下你的电话吗？

en: Excuse me, but is this the right way to the subway station?
zh: 打扰一下，请问去地铁站是这条路吗？

en: I'm sorry, but that brand of cigarettes is out of stock.
zh: 很抱歉，那种牌子的香烟缺货了。

en: I'm sorry, but I didn't understand what you said in English.
zh: 很抱歉，我没听懂你用英语说了什么。

en: I'm sorry. It was just a slip of the tongue.
zh: 对不起，我只是说漏嘴了。

en: Sorry, I'm a stranger here.
zh: 抱歉，我是个外地人，不熟悉这里。

en: I beg your pardon. I didn't think this was your seat.
zh: 对不起，我没注意到这是你的座位。

en: I'm sorry. I did you wrong.
zh: 对不起，我冤枉你了。

en: Excuse me, could you tell me the way to the post office?
zh: 打扰一下，请问去邮局怎么走？

en: You've grown so tall.
zh: 你长这么高了。

en: It's very warm. Shall I turn on the air conditioner?
zh: 很暖和。要我打开空调吗？

en: It was nice of you to go to so much trouble.
zh: 你费心了，真是太好了。

en: The switch is off.
zh: 开关关了。

en: The switch didn't work on time.
zh: 开关没能及时启动。

en: Visitors to Switzerland admire the Alps.
zh: 去瑞士的游客都赞赏阿尔卑斯山。

en: While visiting Switzerland, he became ill with pneumonia.
zh: 在瑞士旅游期间，他得了肺炎。

en: Switzerland is a beautiful country worth visiting.
zh: 瑞士是一个值得一游的美丽国家。

en: Switzerland is famous for its scenic beauty.
zh: 瑞士以其美丽的风景而闻名。

en: Switzerland is a beautiful country.
zh: 瑞士是一个美丽的国家。

en: Switzerland is a neutral country.
zh: 瑞士是一个中立国。

en: Switzerland is situated between France, Italy, Austria and Germany.
zh: 瑞士位于法国、意大利、奥地利和德国之间。

en: We will be enjoying the beautiful scenery of Switzerland.
zh: 我们将欣赏瑞士美丽的风景。

en: Most Swiss people can speak three or four languages.
zh: 大多数瑞士人会说三到四种语言。

en: Switzerland boasts many sights.
zh: 瑞士有很多景点。

en: Speaking of Switzerland, have you ever been there in spring?
zh: 说到瑞士，你有没有在春天去过那里？

en: In Switzerland, spring comes in May.
zh: 在瑞士，春天在五月到来。

en: What language do they speak in Switzerland?
zh: 瑞士人说什么语言？

en: Have you bought a watermelon?
zh: 你买西瓜了吗？

en: Watermelons are in season now.
zh: 现在是西瓜上市的季节。

en: I'd like a suite.
zh: 我想要一个套房。

en: We were entranced by the fabulous suite.
zh: 我们被那间豪华的套房迷住了。

en: I have hives.
zh: 我得了荨麻疹。

en: The cymbals clashed.
zh: 铙钹相撞。

en: Zimbabwe was once a colony of Britain.
zh: 津巴布韦曾经是英国的殖民地。
